text: Hello, <@U0UHG4VP1> , I am working on <https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/1775/>, anyone can help to give me the jenkins api token, and let me try to upload and test my new jenkins job?
<@U0NCW1DPX>: log into the sandbox instance, you should be able to upload it there
<http://Jenkins.hyperledger.org/sandbox|Jenkins.hyperledger.org/sandbox>
I am thinking about use the "jenkins-job update “ command. Anyway, will try to create a new job in jenkins directly. thanks.
<@U11HH3P7Y>: how were you pushing jobs to sandbox?
yeah, it is little difficult to create the jenkins job by manually via the xml files which are generated by jjb. :stuck_out_tongue:
I am creating jobs using JJB and pushing to sandbox with this command `jenkins-jobs --conf jenkins.ini update jjb/ <jobname>`
before to this I have provided my sandbox username, token and URL in jeninks.ini file
<@U11HH3P7Y> thanks, I find my token in the account settings.
sure
<@U11HH3P7Y> what’s the url you are using in the jenkins.ini?
url=<https://jenkins.hyperledger.org/sandbox>
ok, looks like I have no authorized to do that.
jenkins.JenkinsException: Error in request. Possibly authentication failed [403]: Forbidden
<@U0NCW1DPX>: are you able to log in to the sandbox UI?
yes, I can
and I can create a new job in the sandbox UI.
but I can not update jobs via jenkins-job cli
Let me get my laptop
OK I deleted the job marked “please delete me"
do you have any more details around the error? any more context?
